subject: skyscraper
sentence: The new skyscraper resembles a giant sail.
paragraph: People visiting the city are often amazed by its architecture. Among the modern structures stands a unique building. The new skyscraper resembles a giant sail. Its design attracts tourists from all over the world. Architects marvel at its innovative style.

subject: children
sentence: The children fear the dark when they go to bed.
paragraph: Every night, the parents read stories to their children. Despite the tales of bravery, some things still scared them. The children fear the dark when they go to bed. A comforting nightlight helps ease their worries. Eventually, they fall asleep soundly.

subject: manager
sentence: The manager trusts the team to meet the deadline.
paragraph: The company had a major project due soon. Everyone was working extra hours to ensure success. The manager trusts the team to meet the deadline. Confidence in their abilities was well-placed. They completed the project with time to spare.

subject: she
object: the gentle hum of the city
sentence: She hears the gentle hum of the city at night.
paragraph: After a long day, she sits on her balcony to relax. The city lights twinkle in the distance. She hears the gentle hum of the city at night. The sound is oddly comforting to her. It becomes a lullaby, serenading her to sleep.

subject: he
sentence: He misses his family while he is on a business trip.
paragraph: Traveling is a regular part of his job. Each trip takes him away from home for days. He misses his family while he is on a business trip. Video calls help bridge the distance. He looks forward to returning home soon.

subject: she

subject: artist

subject: students

paragraph: In this town, tradition and history are deeply valued. There is a person who embodies these values. The community respects the elderly leader for his wisdom. His guidance helps navigate complex issues. Many seek his counsel on important matters.

subject: project

subject: audience

subject: she
sentence: She remembers the day vividly as if it were yesterday.

subject: he
